subject: Negotiation
title: Good Cop, Bad Cop
description: Learn Good Cop, Bad Cop in one minute.

hook.text: One detective threatens. The other offers coffee. You've seen it in every crime movie.

buildup.text: In negotiation, one side plays tough while a friendlier partner swoops in to 'help.'

discovery.text: It works because the contrast makes the good cop seem reasonable â€” even when they're not.

twist.text: The counter is simple: recognize the pattern and deal only with the decision-maker.

climax.text: Once you name the tactic out loud, it loses almost all its power.

punchline.text: If you spot the game, you can't be played.

quiz.question: How do you counter Good Cop, Bad Cop?
options: Play along and hope for the best
Recognize the pattern and deal with the decision-maker
